mapper.select: select * from `goods_unified_merchandise` where merchandiseId = #{merchandiseId} and type = #{type}
select * from `goods_unified_merchandise` where merchandiseId = #{merchandiseId} and type = #{type} and state = #{state}
mapper.update: update `goods_unified_merchandise` set goodEvaluation = goodEvaluation + 1,updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update `goods_unified_merchandise` set middleEvaluation = middleEvaluation + 1,updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update `goods_unified_merchandise` set lowEvaluation = lowEvaluation + 1,updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update `goods_unified_merchandise` set salesVolume = salesVolume + #{number},updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update `goods_unified_merchandise` set stock = stock - #{stock},updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id} and stock >= #{stock}
mapper.select: select * from `goods_unified_merchandise` where merchantId = #{merchantId} and code=#{code} limit 1
